name: Homemade Pizza
ingredients: 1/2 cups (355 ml) warm water (105 F - 115 F)
1 package (2 1/4 teaspoons) of active dry yeast
feta cheese, firm mozzarella cheese, grated
instructions: Place the water, in the large bowl
Add the flour, salt, sugar, and olive oil, and using the mixing paddle
Spread a thin layer of olive oil over the inside of large bowl
